subject: Concussions
Football
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Dementia
lead_paragraph: Seven former players said the proposed settlement, which includes an uncapped amount of damages for players with severe neurological disorders, would fail to compensate many retirees.
snippet: Seven former players said the proposed settlement, which includes an uncapped amount of damages for players with severe neurological disorders, would fail to compensate many retirees.
